$interpreted: Prison Guard: 48...49...50...
Captain: Stop! Please! If you continue on like this they're going to die!
Lizard General: Relax. They wouldn't be the first.
Lizard General: Hmm...though they are the only two who are still alive. I suppose you're on to something.
Captain: You shouldn't have tortured them in the first place!!!!
Lizard General: The Code of Hammurabi, my friend. You've already killed several of my men.
Lizard General: The dead can't be brought back to life. Whether these two live or die...I'll leave that up to you, Captain.
Captain: You slimy maggot! I'll never speak! Get it over with and kill me already!
Lizard General: Continue.
Prison Guard: Yes, sir.
Prison Guard: 51...52...
Sun Soldier: ...*groan*......ahhhh......*gasp*......
Lazer: ...arghh....
Captain: Stop...!! I'll talk. I said I'll talk! Stop it already!!
Lizard General: Stop.
Captain: ...Rat bastard...
Captain: ......
Lizard General: Speak. What was the plan for your squad? What is the Kingdom's military strategy? Remember, I'm running out of patience.
Lazer: ...ARGHH!!
Sun Soldier: ...*grunt*...*groan*...
Lazer: Why are you doing this!? We are of no value to you!
Lizard General: Hmph! Ask your captain, runt! He set us both up!
Lizard General: The squad I sent was completely annihilated and your captain...well, he fled like a little baby.
Lazer: ——What!?
Sun Soldier: Damn! There's no way Captain would abandon us like that!
Lizard General: Hahaha! You still think you can count on your captain? I can't take this anymore! Tell him what's going on.
Lizard General: He's been planning this the whole time.
Lazer: No wonder...!?
Lizard General: That's right! All of it. From us capturing you and interrogating you, it was all set up by the Kingdom of the Sun.
Lizard General: You soldiers were used like pawns in a chess match. Once you lost your value, they were going to throw you to the dogs.
Lizard General: Bring them to the Colosseum.
Lizard General: I want to see them torn from limb to limb, that way they'll never speak of this!
Sun Soldier: The Colosseum? No!! Let us go!! I'm begging you! I'm just an ordinary guy——
Sun Soldier: ………………
Sun Soldier: …………*grunts*...Lazer.
Lazer: ………………
Sun Soldier: I can't hold on for much longer. But it looks like you've got some energy left in you.
Lazer: ...What's your point?
Sun Soldier: I'm scared. I can't do this.
Lazer: ...This is the only chance we have at surviving.
Sun Soldier: Living like this...I can't do it. What do you say we make a deal?
Sun Soldier: I stole some drugs. It's only enough to kill one person.
Sun Soldier: I don't even have the energy to take it out...how about you take it?
Lazer: Are you crazy!?
Sun Soldier: Use what power you've got left to kill me. You can take the drugs.
Sun Soldier: We'll both be free. That's a fair deal, isn't it?
Lazer: ...Are you sure this is what you want?
Sun Soldier: Do it. Free me from this world.
Sun Soldier: ...Forgive me, Lazer...I'm not like you...I...I...I have faith in you.
Sun Soldier: After all...you're the best on the squad.
Lazer: ...If I just drink this I'll...
Lazer: Rats...I'm shaking...
Lazer: Wait a second, this drink...
Lazer: *cough*...I knew it! It's just Plum Wine from the countryside!
Lazer: That rascal's been keeping this on him the whole time?
Lazer: Idiot!! I'll never get home!!
Lazer: Nothing...nothing!! I've got nothing!!!!
Lazer: Where's the poison!? Where's the poison!!?
Sun Soldier: ...Forgive me, Lazer...I'm not like you...I...I...I have faith in you.
Sun Soldier: After all...you're the best on the squad.
Lazer: ——You tricked me!? There never was any poison, was there?
Lazer: And you're sorry!!?? What use is that to me? What am I going to do!?
Lazer: ARGHH!!
Prison Guard: It's time. What the hell are you guys doing?
Lazer: ...Best on the squad, eh? I like the sound of that.
Lazer: ...Unfortunately, I ain't your guy.
Prison Guard: Wha-What are you doing?
Lazer: I want you...to kill me!!!
Lazer: My country doesn't want me and my comrades have betrayed me. It seems that life is more brutal than death...
Lazer: And yet...

Where's the poison!!?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_22_000","SpeakerName":"Sun Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3286c3","IconName":"h3286c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Forgive me, Lazer...I'm not like you...I...I...I have faith in you.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_22_001","SpeakerName":"Sun Soldier","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3286c3","IconName":"h3286c3_sorrow","IconLocate":2,"Text":"After all...you're the best on the squad.","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_23_000","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3281c2","IconName":"h3281c2_surprise","IconLocate":2,"Text":"\u2014\u2014You tricked me!? I like the sound of that.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_018","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_25_002","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3281c2","IconName":"h3281c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"...Unfortunately, I ain't your guy.","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_001","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_26_000","SpeakerName":"Prison Guard","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/t3188c3","IconName":"t3188c3_normal","IconLocate":2,"Text":"Wha-What are you doing?","sfxName":"","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_26_001","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3281c2","IconName":"h3281c2_anger","IconLocate":2,"Text":"I want you...to kill me!!!","sfxName":"h0152sx_story_003","sfxVolume":1.0},{"ID":"char_h0152_003_dialog_english##_27_000","SpeakerName":"Lazer","SpeakerAssetName":"CharacterName/h3281c2","IconName":"h3281c2_serious","IconLocate":2,"Text":"My country doesn't want me and my comrades have betrayed me.
